text: Jack William Nicklaus (born January 21, 1940 in Columbus, Ohio) is an American golfer who is known for winning the most victories in major championships with 18 wins. Nicklaus became the oldest golfer to win The Masters Tournament when he won in 1986 and holds the record for most top tens (22), and the most cuts made (37). Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American golfers Category:Sportspeople from Columbus, Ohio
title: Jack Nicklaus
